page.title: 16FARMING,LAND,STOCK,&CROPS.
page.content: The largest farm in this area is the privately owned Hinton St. Mary farm. the size of this mixed farm is 1700 acres,of which 200 acres is woodland. It employs 11 staff and owns land in Sturminster Newton and Fiddleford. Employees are supplied with homes if they require them. The land is used as follows; WHEAT=700 ACRES, PEAS=200 ACRES, CORN=400 ACRES,AND PASTURES=200 ACRES. The farm also owns cattle most of wnich are milkers. { { MACHINERY}The farm has about 13 tractors, most of which are American John Deeres but there are also Fords, Massey Furgusens and Internationals. Other machinery includes ploughs, trailors, bailers, and combines. They own 2 bailers, 1 produces round bales, the other square. {BUILDINGS}There are about 25 buildings in Sturminster but there are more in
